!http://eeroan.github.com/WebConsole-reporter/screenshot.png!

Try it from "here":http://eeroan.github.com/WebConsole-reporter/example/index.html

h1. Mocha WebConsole reporter

* Works at least with Chrome and Firefox
* Faster than html reporter
* Makes links clickable in stacktrace
* Shows only failed tests
* Provides urls for running separate tests
* Supports AMD
